segments.text: Yes , sir . It's the specialty of our restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want an order of that . By the way , I want it hot . I like chili .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , sir . Don't you want to have some drinks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bring me a bottle of beer .
segments.speaker: S1
